name: Brilliant Arrows
desc:
With a wave of your hand, a volley of three multicolored arrows of light fly forth. Up to three creatures within range must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage per AP spent.

Hit or miss, the arrows remain embedded in whatever they strike, radiating bright light out to 10 feet, plus 10 feet for every AP spent past the first, and revealing hidden or invisible creatures within range for the duration. A creature with an arrow stuck in them can spend 1 AP to crush it and end the effect.
empower: Damage increased by 1d8. Fires an additional arrow at one more target.
author: CrusaderDroid
